Author: tigerchik
Text: Your title made me laugh. The book "brain over binge" has really helped me stop bingeing. Today's day 17 in a row w/o bingeing. Congrats on stopping purging - that is REALLY good.

Author: algorthin
Text: I want to tell you that binging without purging in the first month or two of recovery is really common, even if you're doing everything else that you're supposed to be doing for recovery. Getting through a month without purging is awesome and impressive and I'm proud of you. You need to start to figure out what triggers your binges so that you can cope with them and find new ways to deal with whatever is going on. This hasn't been a wasted month, you've made great progress.
